Why would students need to retake the Capstone workshop if they fail the Capstone under the new QP?

The Capstone is integrated and comprised of three full-day workshops and the Final Examination. Students are required to complete the assessment tasks across the Capstone and meet the overall assessment in order to complete the Capstone. Completion of the Capstone provides a formal verification that students can demonstrate a required competent-practitioner level of performance. Students who fail to achieve the overall assessment will therefore be required to retake the Capstone, i.e. both the Workshops and the Final Examination.

replies.msg:
Hello, 我係Taky。我見有啲同學仔想了解New QP某啲比較唔清楚既rules，希望幫到大家: (由於quote埋Position Paper所以有啲長，sorry about that)

Professional Level (four individual modules: Module 11 (QPA), Module 12 (QPB), Module 13 (QPC), Module 14 (QPD)
1. QP students who have remaining module(s) of the current QP to complete will be required to take the corresponding Professional Module(s) of the new QP. There is no need to attend the introductory workshop. (Position Paper 5.18(a))

2. QP students who have passed the technical workshops but not the examination of the remaining module(s) of the current QP will not be required to attend the workshop of the corresponding Professional Module(s) of the new QP. (Position Paper 5.18(b)) 即係Current QP passed左既workshops去到New QP唔駛再take，只係考試就ok。

3. Completion of the workshops before sitting the relevant module examinations will be the preferred sequence. (Position Paper 3.16) 即係任何New QP Module你都可以先考試，下屆再上workshop，or 同一屆先上workshop再考試又得。更加明顯既係workshop討論既內容絕對唔會成為exam既任何hint。

4. A maximum of two modules can be taken in the first attempt with no restriction on the number of module enrolments for resit. (Position Paper 3.17) 呢度既first attempt只係計New QP既first attempt，Current QP你take過同一科唔關事的。即係如果你New QP需要take Modules 11+13+14，你Jun 2021最多只可以take兩個Modules，但你Dec 2021就可以一次過take晒三個Modules (one Module first attempt and two Modules retake)。

5. Students must complete each module of the Associate and Professional Levels within four attempts. Failed attempts at AAT Examination, PBE and current QP will not be counted towards the number of attempts for modules under the new QP. (Position Paper 3.28) 即係fail既四次全部只係計New QP only，Current QP fail既次數係唔會計落呢四次既New QP fail count。

6. Students who cannot complete a particular module after four attempts at the Associate Level or the Professional Level are required to retake all the modules in the respective level again as any previous examination pass results at that level will be removed. Retake of passed workshops in the Professional Level is not required. (Position Paper 3.29) 呢度有啲唔清淅: Current QP pass左既Module係唔需要喺New QP考過 (Under the cross-credit arrangement, the pass that students have obtained for a module under the current QP will be deemed to be a pass for the corresponding module of the new QP (Position Paper 5.18)).。例如有個學生Current QP passed左QPB only，佢喺New QP pass左Module 11 (QPA) and Module 14 (QPD)，就算佢fail左Module 13 (QPC)四次，佢要retake既都只係New QP要考既Modules，即係Modules 11+13+14，仲要只係retake exams only，pass左既workshops係唔需要retake既。

Capstone Exam
1. QP students who have completed all the modules but not yet passed the Final Examination of the current QP will be required to take the Capstone of the new QP. (Position Paper 5.18(c))

2. Full attendance of the Capstone workshops is a prerequisite to sit the Examination. (Position Paper 3.23) 即係一定要同一屆上左workshop先可以考試。

3. Students who fail to achieve the overall assessment will be required to retake the Capstone. (Position Paper 3.25) 即係每一次fail左Capstone Exam都一定要下一屆retake晒三日full day既workshop+exam。

4. Capstone Exam冇fail四次既restriction (Position Paper 3.31).

(Link for New QP Position Paper: https://www.hkicpa.org.hk/en/Become-a-Hong-Kong-CPA/New-QP/Position-Paper)

哇屌 好亂呀 我聽日打多次問

Hello, 我係Taky。我見有啲同學仔想了解New QP某啲比較唔清楚既rules，希望幫到大家: (由於quote埋Position Paper所以有啲長，sorry about that)

Professional Level (four individual modules: Module 11 (QPA), Module 12 (QPB), Module 13 (QPC), Module 14 (QPD)
1. QP students who have remaining module(s) of the current QP to complete will be required to take the corresponding Professional Module(s) of the new QP. There is no need to attend the introductory workshop. (Position Paper 5.18(a))

2. QP students who have passed the technical workshops but not the examination of the remaining module(s) of the current QP will not be required to attend the workshop of the corresponding Professional Module(s) of the new QP. (Position Paper 5.18(b)) 即係Current QP passed左既workshops去到New QP唔駛再take，只係考試就ok。

3. Completion of the workshops before sitting the relevant module examinations will be the preferred sequence. (Position Paper 3.16) 即係任何New QP Module你都可以先考試，下屆再上workshop，or 同一屆先上workshop再考試又得。更加明顯既係workshop討論既內容絕對唔會成為exam既任何hint。

4. A maximum of two modules can be taken in the first attempt with no restriction on the number of module enrolments for resit. (Position Paper 3.17) 呢度既first attempt只係計New QP既first attempt，Current QP你take過同一科唔關事的。即係如果你New QP需要take Modules 11+13+14，你Jun 2021最多只可以take兩個Modules，但你Dec 2021就可以一次過take晒三個Modules (one Module first attempt and two Modules retake)。

5. Students must complete each module of the Associate and Professional Levels within four attempts. Failed attempts at AAT Examination, PBE and current QP will not be counted towards the number of attempts for modules under the new QP. (Position Paper 3.28) 即係fail既四次全部只係計New QP only，Current QP fail既次數係唔會計落呢四次既New QP fail count。

6. Students who cannot complete a particular module after four attempts at the Associate Level or the Professional Level are required to retake all the modules in the respective level again as any previous examination pass results at that level will be removed. Retake of passed workshops in the Professional Level is not required. (Position Paper 3.29) 呢度有啲唔清淅: Current QP pass左既Module係唔需要喺New QP考過 (Under the cross-credit arrangement, the pass that students have obtained for a module under the current QP will be deemed to be a pass for the corresponding module of the new QP (Position Paper 5.18)).。例如有個學生Current QP passed左QPB only，佢喺New QP pass左Module 11 (QPA) and Module 14 (QPD)，就算佢fail左Module 13 (QPC)四次，佢要retake既都只係New QP要考既Modules，即係Modules 11+13+14，仲要只係retake exams only，pass左既workshops係唔需要retake既。

Capstone Exam
1. QP students who have completed all the modules but not yet passed the Final Examination of the current QP will be required to take the Capstone of the new QP. (Position Paper 5.18(c))

2. Full attendance of the Capstone workshops is a prerequisite to sit the Examination. (Position Paper 3.23) 即係一定要同一屆上左workshop先可以考試。

3. Students who fail to achieve the overall assessment will be required to retake the Capstone. (Position Paper 3.25) 即係每一次fail左Capstone Exam都一定要下一屆retake晒三日full day既workshop+exam。

4. Capstone Exam冇fail四次既restriction (Position Paper 3.31).

(Link for New QP Position Paper: https://www.hkicpa.org.hk/en/Become-a-Hong-Kong-CPA/New-QP/Position-Paper)

希望大家好好享受假期，同身體健康! Happy New Year!

哇屌 好亂呀 我聽日打多次問

Hello, 我係Taky。我見有啲同學仔想了解New QP某啲比較唔清楚既rules，希望幫到大家: (由於quote埋Position Paper所以有啲長，sorry about that)

Professional Level (four individual modules: Module 11 (QPA), Module 12 (QPB), Module 13 (QPC), Module 14 (QPD)
1. QP students who have remaining module(s) of the current QP to complete will be required to take the corresponding Professional Module(s) of the new QP. There is no need to attend the introductory workshop. (Position Paper 5.18(a))

2. QP students who have passed the technical workshops but not the examination of the remaining module(s) of the current QP will not be required to attend the workshop of the corresponding Professional Module(s) of the new QP. (Position Paper 5.18(b)) 即係Current QP passed左既workshops去到New QP唔駛再take，只係考試就ok。

3. Completion of the workshops before sitting the relevant module examinations will be the preferred sequence. (Position Paper 3.16) 即係任何New QP Module你都可以先考試，下屆再上workshop，or 同一屆先上workshop再考試又得。更加明顯既係workshop討論既內容絕對唔會成為exam既任何hint。

4. A maximum of two modules can be taken in the first attempt with no restriction on the number of module enrolments for resit. (Position Paper 3.17) 呢度既first attempt只係計New QP既first attempt，Current QP你take過同一科唔關事的。即係如果你New QP需要take Modules 11+13+14，你Jun 2021最多只可以take兩個Modules，但你Dec 2021就可以一次過take晒三個Modules (one Module first attempt and two Modules retake)。

5. Students must complete each module of the Associate and Professional Levels within four attempts. Failed attempts at AAT Examination, PBE and current QP will not be counted towards the number of attempts for modules under the new QP. (Position Paper 3.28) 即係fail既四次全部只係計New QP only，Current QP fail既次數係唔會計落呢四次既New QP fail count。

6. Students who cannot complete a particular module after four attempts at the Associate Level or the Professional Level are required to retake all the modules in the respective level again as any previous examination pass results at that level will be removed. Retake of passed workshops in the Professional Level is not required. (Position Paper 3.29) 呢度有啲唔清淅: Current QP pass左既Module係唔需要喺New QP考過 (Under the cross-credit arrangement, the pass that students have obtained for a module under the current QP will be deemed to be a pass for the corresponding module of the new QP (Position Paper 5.18)).。例如有個學生Current QP passed左QPB only，佢喺New QP pass左Module 11 (QPA) and Module 14 (QPD)，就算佢fail左Module 13 (QPC)四次，佢要retake既都只係New QP要考既Modules，即係Modules 11+13+14，仲要只係retake exams only，pass左既workshops係唔需要retake既。

Capstone Exam
1. QP students who have completed all the modules but not yet passed the Final Examination of the current QP will be required to take the Capstone of the new QP. (Position Paper 5.18(c))

2. Full attendance of the Capstone workshops is a prerequisite to sit the Examination. (Position Paper 3.23) 即係一定要同一屆上左workshop先可以考試。

3. Students who fail to achieve the overall assessment will be required to retake the Capstone. (Position Paper 3.25) 即係每一次fail左Capstone Exam都一定要下一屆retake晒三日full day既workshop+exam。

4. Capstone Exam冇fail四次既restriction (Position Paper 3.31).

(Link for New QP Position Paper: https://www.hkicpa.org.hk/en/Become-a-Hong-Kong-CPA/New-QP/Position-Paper)

希望大家好好享受假期，同身體健康! Happy New Year!

又係我Taky Sir呀，啱啱八卦睇HKICPA New QP Student Handbook，其中一段幾interesting:

Examination results

Candidates who fail an examination may apply for an appeal on the examination result within five working days after the date of examination results release. Application can be made via the Student Centre (Member’s area > Student Zone > Self-service Student Centre. Then navigate to the “Enrol” section and click the “View my grades”). The appeal fees per examination are listed below:
Associate Level Examination HK$1,500
Professional Level Examination HK$2,500
Capstone HK$6,000

The appeal outcome will be announced within 20 working days after the appeal application deadline.If you are eligible for the application, an acknowledgement of receipt will be sent to your designated email account. Settle the application fee of HK$200 per examination via the Student Centre (Member’s area > Student Zone > Self-service Student Centre). The performance analysis report will be provided to applicants by email within 2 weeks after the application deadline.

即係咁，而家Associate Level已經係pitch to HKQF (資歷架構) Level 5，雖然New QP Professional and Capstone Level冇pitch to HKQF，New QP一樣可以俾學生appeal。例如你覺得自己應該合格但最後肥左，你appeal既話，公會會將你份卷重新再mark一次，係有機會令你由fail變pass，當然亦可以維持原判。做法同Current QP既script review有所不同。

Taky Sir

pinned.msg:
Hello, 我係Taky。我見有啲同學仔想了解New QP某啲比較唔清楚既rules，希望幫到大家: (由於quote埋Position Paper所以有啲長，sorry about that)

Professional Level (four individual modules: Module 11 (QPA), Module 12 (QPB), Module 13 (QPC), Module 14 (QPD)
1. QP students who have remaining module(s) of the current QP to complete will be required to take the corresponding Professional Module(s) of the new QP. There is no need to attend the introductory workshop. (Position Paper 5.18(a))

2. QP students who have passed the technical workshops but not the examination of the remaining module(s) of the current QP will not be required to attend the workshop of the corresponding Professional Module(s) of the new QP. (Position Paper 5.18(b)) 即係Current QP passed左既workshops去到New QP唔駛再take，只係考試就ok。

3. Completion of the workshops before sitting the relevant module examinations will be the preferred sequence. (Position Paper 3.16) 即係任何New QP Module你都可以先考試，下屆再上workshop，or 同一屆先上workshop再考試又得。更加明顯既係workshop討論既內容絕對唔會成為exam既任何hint。

4. A maximum of two modules can be taken in the first attempt with no restriction on the number of module enrolments for resit. (Position Paper 3.17) 呢度既first attempt只係計New QP既first attempt，Current QP你take過同一科唔關事的。即係如果你New QP需要take Modules 11+13+14，你Jun 2021最多只可以take兩個Modules，但你Dec 2021就可以一次過take晒三個Modules (one Module first attempt and two Modules retake)。

5. Students must complete each module of the Associate and Professional Levels within four attempts. Failed attempts at AAT Examination, PBE and current QP will not be counted towards the number of attempts for modules under the new QP. (Position Paper 3.28) 即係fail既四次全部只係計New QP only，Current QP fail既次數係唔會計落呢四次既New QP fail count。

6. Students who cannot complete a particular module after four attempts at the Associate Level or the Professional Level are required to retake all the modules in the respective level again as any previous examination pass results at that level will be removed. Retake of passed workshops in the Professional Level is not required. (Position Paper 3.29) 呢度有啲唔清淅: Current QP pass左既Module係唔需要喺New QP考過 (Under the cross-credit arrangement, the pass that students have obtained for a module under the current QP will be deemed to be a pass for the corresponding module of the new QP (Position Paper 5.18)).。例如有個學生Current QP passed左QPB only，佢喺New QP pass左Module 11 (QPA) and Module 14 (QPD)，就算佢fail左Module 13 (QPC)四次，佢要retake既都只係New QP要考既Modules，即係Modules 11+13+14，仲要只係retake exams only，pass左既workshops係唔需要retake既。

Capstone Exam
1. QP students who have completed all the modules but not yet passed the Final Examination of the current QP will be required to take the Capstone of the new QP. (Position Paper 5.18(c))

2. Full attendance of the Capstone workshops is a prerequisite to sit the Examination. (Position Paper 3.23) 即係一定要同一屆上左workshop先可以考試。

3. Students who fail to achieve the overall assessment will be required to retake the Capstone. (Position Paper 3.25) 即係每一次fail左Capstone Exam都一定要下一屆retake晒三日full day既workshop+exam。

4. Capstone Exam冇fail四次既restriction (Position Paper 3.31).

(Link for New QP Position Paper: https://www.hkicpa.org.hk/en/Become-a-Hong-Kong-CPA/New-QP/Position-Paper)
